translation.ja: これを息子に見せてる

translation.en: I'm like, See, this is what happens when you don't take your medication.
translation.ja: 服薬しないと こうなると 分かるようにね

translation.en: He kept getting into physical altercations with another student at the school, and Rahiem's nose got broken.
translation.ja: 学校でケンカばかりして あの子は鼻の骨が折れた

translation.en: I actually had to press charges against the other kid.
translation.ja: 責任は相手の子にあったわ

translation.en: And I felt like I could no longer handle him,
translation.ja: もう私の手には 負えなくなってしまって⸺

translation.en: so I allowed him to go live with his father in New Jersey.
translation.ja: 父親と暮らすようにさせた

translation.en: That's his oldest brother. He's 18.
translation.ja: 長男よ　18歳なの

translation.en: There was plenty of incidents. And the day he turned 15, he stole my car.
translation.ja: 私の車を盗んだこともあった

translation.en: To do what?
translation.ja: 何ですって？

translation.en: He just stole my car.
translation.ja: 私の車を盗んだの

translation.en: I went to go look for my car, and it was gone.
translation.ja: 車を取りに行ったら 消えてたの

translation.en: Parents are crying. By the time they get to the doctor, they're crying, they're hurting.
translation.ja: 親たちは病院に来る前に 心を痛めて泣いてる

translation.en: They don't know what to do with these little people when they act like that.
translation.ja: 子供の行動に対処できないの

translation.en: There's so much negativity going around,
translation.ja: ネガティブなことばかりよ

translation.en: saying that if a kid does this too much, if a kid does that too much,
translation.ja: 医師に詳しい症状を 説明しても⸺

translation.en: a doctor automatically wants to say that they're ADD or ADHD to just give them medication.
translation.ja: ＡＤＤやＡＤＨＤだと 機械的に診断し薬を出すだけ

translation.en: Me being a parent that actually has a child with it,
translation.ja: ＡＤＤの子を持つ 親として⸺

translation.en: and I can tell the difference between Rahiem and my oldest son.
translation.ja: 私には ラヒームと長男の 違いが分かる

translation.en: And as a parent, sometimes it's disheartening because...
translation.ja: でも時々 気が滅入ってしまうわ

translation.en: you feel like you're not doing everything that you can do for your kids.
translation.ja: 自分の努力が足りないと 感じるのよ

translation.en: I still try and encourage him from here. I ask him every day I talk to him,
translation.ja: 今も息子に電話して 服薬したか確認するの

translation.en: Did you take you take your meds? And he goes, Yes, Mom, I took my meds.
translation.ja: 今も息子に電話して 服薬したか確認するの “飲んだよ 母さん”って いつも言われるわ

translation.en: But... I'm hoping this is a good move.
translation.ja: “飲んだよ 母さん”って いつも言われるわ 父親の元で うまくいくといい

translation.en: 'Cause I'm missing him like crazy.
translation.ja: 息子が恋しいわ

translation.en: I don't think he'd have gotten through high school without Adderall.
translation.ja: 薬なしで高校卒業は 無理だった

translation.en: He would have gotten through, but I can't say that he would be where he is, to be honest, if he wasn't on it.
translation.ja: できたとしても今の息子が あったかは分からない

translation.en: As much as I think he's very angry at me for putting him on the Adderall,
translation.ja: 息子はアデロールを 無理に飲ませると怒るの

translation.en: I think that he appreciates me being the heavy,
translation.ja: でも⸺ 私に感謝してるはずよ

translation.en: because if I wasn't, you know...
translation.ja: 私に感謝してるはずよ 薬なしでは⸺

translation.en: where would we all be?
translation.ja: どうなったことか

translation.en: I was very fortunate.
translation.ja: 僕は幸運だよ

translation.en: I started this process on New Year's, 2016, and said,
translation.ja: この仕事を 2016年の年明けに決心し⸺

translation.en: Erin, my girlfriend, I think I'm going to do a boot camp.
translation.ja: 恋人のエリンに 集中合宿に行くと伝えた

translation.en: And then I did all of the things that I had to do
translation.ja: それからの僕は やるべきことを⸺ １つ残らず やったんだよ

translation.en: to make that happen.
translation.ja: １つ残らず やったんだよ

translation.en: One of those things was getting on Adderall.
translation.ja: 服薬も その１つだ

translation.en: I pretty much got everything I wanted. The pay's great, and a recruiter from Google approached me.
translation.ja: 収入はいいし グーグルの 採用担当から連絡が来た

translation.en: And that's crazy. For me, that's crazy.
translation.ja: 僕には⸺ すごいことだ

translation.en: There's no way any of that would have been possible without the medication.
translation.ja: 薬がなければ できなかったよ

translation.en: That might be because I have really severe ADHD,

translation.en: and have a hard time performing in the ways needed.
translation.ja: 思い通りに働けない

translation.en: It might be because it was jet fuel and it got me where I needed to go.
translation.ja: 服薬の目的が 治療か能力向上かで⸺

translation.en: I don't try to draw a line between those.
translation.ja: 線引きする気はない

translation.en: Have you tried any of the stimulants yourself?
translation.ja: 興奮剤を試したことは？

translation.en: One time, in that first Ritalin study.
translation.ja: リタリンの研究中に １度 試したよ

translation.en: It was sort of late afternoon.
translation.ja: あれは夕方のことだった

translation.en: I felt like it was such an enhancement of my day.
translation.ja: 自分の能力が 非常に向上したように感じた

translation.en: So, yes, you know, it was a good experience,
translation.ja: もちろん いい体験ではあったけど⸺

translation.en: and thank goodness I did not decide to dip into that barrel ever again.
translation.ja: 幸いにも また薬に手を 出そうとは思わなかったよ

translation.en: Did you get your grades back already?
translation.ja: 成績は回復した？

translation.en: I got one grade back from the exam I took this morning at 10:00.
translation.ja: 今朝の試験で 評価を１つ取り戻した

translation.en: And I got an A.
translation.ja: Ａだったの

translation.en: The stress really doesn't ever leave entirely.
translation.ja: ストレスは一生つきまとう

translation.en: But I'm excited, once I graduate, to be able to leave that at work.
translation.ja: でも職場では 成績の心配はないから⸺ それは うれしいな

translation.en: I have a pretty good feeling that this will be the end of my relationship with Adderall.
translation.ja: これで薬との関係を 断てるような気がする

translation.en: Hopefully, in the adult world, I'll manage my time well enough
translation.ja: 社会に出たら 自分で時間を管理して⸺

translation.en: that there won't be a time where I need to take prescription drugs, to get my work done.
translation.ja: 処方薬を飲まずに 仕事ができるようにしたいわ

translation.en: Hopefully, it's the end.
translation.ja: 将来のことは まだ分からないけど⸺

translation.en: I don't know where I will be, but when I picture it,
translation.ja: 将来のことは まだ分からないけど⸺ アデロールを飲む自分は 想像しない

translation.en: I don't picture myself taking Adderall.
translation.ja: アデロールを飲む自分は 想像しない

translation.en: The purpose of Adderall for me is to focus on work.
translation.ja: 集中するために服薬する

translation.en: If I can get to a place where work is running itself and things are okay, then I don't need it.
translation.ja: 仕事がうまくいき始めれば 薬は要らないんだ

translation.en: If I hit for $200 million dollars tomorrow, I'd never take Adderall again.
translation.ja: 明日２億ドル当たれば もう服薬しない

translation.en: But then I need my Adderall to remember to play, 'cause I keep forgetting to play the lottery.
translation.ja: でも宝くじのやり方を 思い出すのに飲むか

translation.en: I'm just so much more boring when I'm on my medication. Also angrier.
translation.ja: 服薬してる時の自分は 退屈で怒りっぽい

translation.en: But yesterday, I had to study all day, so I was on Vyvanse, and I took an Adderall, and I was wired the whole time.
translation.ja: でも昨日は勉強のために １日中 薬漬けだったわ

translation.en: Felt like shit, but I got my work done.
translation.ja: 嫌だったけど 勉強は終わった

translation.en: So, it's just this balance you have to figure out.
translation.ja: バランスを考えないとね

translation.en: I'm just getting a little disillusioned with this higher education thing.
translation.ja: 高等教育というものに うんざりしてきた

translation.en: You need a bachelor's degree to be anybody.
translation.ja: 学士号を取るために⸺

translation.en: And we're all high on ADD meds as a group of 20- something- year- olds just fighting each other for...
translation.ja: 若者がＡＤＤの薬を飲んで 競い合ってるのよ

translation.en: For what? To set the curve in a class?
translation.ja: テストで最高点を取るため？

translation.en: What you have here is a dynamic
translation.ja: 現代には 大きな問題があるんだ

translation.en: of not only people using what is a dangerous drug,
translation.ja: 現代には 大きな問題があるんだ 人々は危険な薬を 不適切な方法で⸺

translation.en: particularly when used improperly.
translation.ja: 使用している

translation.en: But you also find a bit of an arms race building up
translation.ja: その上 世の中は競争社会だ

translation.en: where if enough people see that their competition is doing it,
translation.ja: 多くの人々が⸺ 競争相手がやってるなら 自分もやらねばと感じる

translation.en: they feel like they kind of have to do it, too.
translation.ja: 競争相手がやってるなら 自分もやらねばと感じる

translation.en: I think focusing on the use, or abuse,
translation.ja: 私は こう考えている 薬物の使用にせよ乱用にせよ その背景には⸺

translation.en: depending on how people feel about this,
translation.ja: 薬物の使用にせよ乱用にせよ その背景には⸺

translation.en: is symptomatic of something broader.
translation.ja: 何か大きな問題がある

translation.en: This highly competitive environment
translation.ja: 我々は激しい競争社会にいる

translation.en: in which people feel compelled
translation.ja: 人々は 自分の 能力以上の競争を⸺

translation.en: to compete beyond their possibilities to get ahead.
translation.ja: 強いられているように 感じるんだ

translation.en: This kind of focus
translation.ja: 物質的な進歩と生産性に⸺

translation.en: on material progress and productivity...
translation.ja: 物質的な進歩と生産性に⸺ 重きが置かれている状況だよ

translation.en: What's the cost of that? And is that a cost we're willing to live with?
translation.ja: でも その代償は 耐えるに値するものだろうか

translation.en: I wouldn't say that I'm happy to have Adderall,
translation.ja: アデロールを 喜ばしくは思わない

translation.en: but I'm happy that Adderall is an option for him.
translation.ja: でもその選択肢があって よかった

translation.en: After not being on it all the time, I feel more comfortable with who I am, with my body and stuff.
translation.ja: 完全に薬をやめてから 心も体も落ち着いてる

translation.en: I would never put my kid on Adderall, ever,
translation.ja: 将来 我が子には与えない

translation.en: 'cause I know what it does to you, and it's not fun being on it.
translation.ja: 薬から受ける影響を 知っているからね

translation.en: I feel like it was too easy to put  a kid on something close to meth and not question it.
translation.ja: 子供に危険な薬を与えるのは 浅はかすぎる

translation.en: There's other things you can do. Just teach him how to focus.
translation.ja: できることは他にある

translation.en: It was about being the best.
translation.ja: １番でいたかった

translation.en: The NFL is a symbol of that level, really.
translation.ja: ＮＦＬは最高水準の 象徴だからね 本当に

translation.en: Do you wish that you had not taken that Ritalin?
translation.ja: リタリンを飲まなければ よかったと思いますか？

translation.en: No. I mean, I was doing what I had to do,
translation.ja: いいや すべきことをしたまでだ

translation.en: and I'm happy to be on this next chapter of my life.
translation.ja: それに今は 人生の 次の段階に進めて幸せだよ

translation.en: It's never so bad that you can't climb out of the hole.
translation.ja: 時には挫折するのも そんなに悪くない

translation.en: Adderall, the drug of our time.
translation.ja: アデロールは現代の薬よ

translation.en: I suppose the question of what's lost if we all were in an Adderall world,
translation.ja: アデロールを使うことで⸺ 失うものは何か

translation.en: is the question, What is it all for?
translation.ja: そして何のために失うのか

translation.en: I just lost my thought. Hang on one second.
translation.ja: 続きを忘れたわ　待ってね

translation.en: I had it. I had an example.
translation.ja: 続きを忘れたわ　待ってね 例え話が…

translation.en: What we also might say is lost is what human beings do
translation.ja: 人間というものは 時に何かを見失うことがある

translation.en: when they muse and when they reflect
translation.ja: 物思いにふけったり 考え込んだり⸺

translation.en: and when their thoughts wander.
translation.ja: 考えがさまよったり…

translation.en: I know what I'll do. Okay.
translation.ja: 思い出した

translation.en: And out of that comes, what?
translation.ja: さまよった末に 生まれるのは⸺

translation.en: Creativity, art,
translation.ja: 創造力や⸺ 芸術

translation.en: extraordinary moments of human connection.
translation.ja: そして人と人との特別な瞬間

translation.en: Of course, also moments of intense human pain and grief,
translation.ja: もちろん 時には 激しい痛みや悲しみもね

translation.en: but I would describe them as the experience of being human itself.
translation.ja: でもそれを体験してこそ 人間なのよ
